reviewText: It's about the only video on Greco out there. Good info for basics

This is a beyond-basic look at GR wrestling.  The techniques are done in a static, unrealistic manner, with little explanation.  It also didn't cover much about good strategy and training methodology for the sport.

Not a bad dvd for some GR techniques.

However, it is far from comprehesive and some of the East European instructers could use some voice-overs.
